title: Parliamentary questions and answers
description: Answers to parliamentary questions put to ministers from other members of Dáil Éireann
cleaned_text: Questions and answers published after July 2012 can be viewed here. Viewing by Government Department is possible by term or specific dates from March 2016 onwards. Written answers are published as received from departments. To see parliamentary questions published before July 2012, search in [Dáil debates](/en/debates/find/?debateType=dail).
